title: 3-year-old and four adults shot in Evanston
content:
CINCINNATI (Brad Underwood) -- Police responded to shots fired in Evanston Monday evening, Sept. 28.
The incident happened in the 1800 block of Hewitt Avenue. Police worked into the night on a very large crime scene.
Officials confirmed four adult, male victims were taken to UC Medical Center.
A 3-year-old was also hit with a bullet. The boy was shot in the leg and taken to Children's Hospital.
All injuries appeared to be non-life threatening. No word on any suspects.
